title: Roast chicken croquettes with spicy tomato chutney
description: Making crunchy croquettes is a great way to use up leftover chicken. And while they are chilling in the fridge before you fry them, you’ve got time to make your own spicy tomato chutney.
ingredients: 500g/1lb 2oz floury potatoes, peeled and cut into 2.5cm/1in cubes
¼ tsp freshly ground black pepper
3 shallots, halved lengthwise and then sliced
good pinch dried chilli flakes, to taste
